english.segment2: Left for dead by the waters edge
english.segment3: Youre the thorn in my side
english.segment4: I try to dig you out
english.segment6: Hate to admit it but lying was worth it
english.segment7: to dig you out of my head
english.segment8: Are we dust in the wind?
english.segment9: look at all the things we lack
english.segment11: Are we dust in the wind?
english.segment13: far from where i want to be
english.segment18: If I can believe the blind can see
english.segment19: Then God knows the trouble Im in
english.segment20: to dig you out of my head
english.segment21: look at all the things you lack
english.segment22: Its not just talk its who you are
english.segment23: Look at all the things you left
